name: Jordimandus

specials.name: Sloth Specializtion
specials.description: For each level of spell he can cast, Jordimandus can use Drain Bonded item once per day to recall a spell belonging to the Conjuration school of that level (instead of using it only once per day in total, and instead of using it for any spell).  Jordimandus cannot cast any spells from the Evocation or Illusion schools.

specials.name: Heart of Slime
specials.description: Jordimandus' heart grants him supernatural constitution and fortitude. When he rolls a success on a fortitude save, he gets a critical success instead. He is immune to critical hits and precision damage. The heart also makes him effectively immortal by ceasing his aging and nourishing him. Oozes do not attack Jordimandus as a result of his unholy heart. If all four of the variant ochre jellies in the surrounding pipes are slain, Jordimandusâ€™s access to the life-giving humors ceases and his heart begins to decay. He immediately loses all the benefits granted him by the heart, and furthermore becomes drained 1 and increases the drained value by 1 for each day until he perishes.
